name: Two-Faced (AlexDarigan)
description:
Two-Faced

Platformer where you and your enemies are dice. Your faces change as you move, when you come into contact with an Enemy, the entity with the lowest face will die (if tie, your enemy dies).

INPUT
A & D for Left & Right on QWERTY
A & Q for Left & Right on AZERTY
Space for Jump on both.
